subject: refactor: update theme for darker, more colorful design
body:
- Darken base background from #1B1B1B to #0F0F0F (near OLED black)
- Add tone category colors: Feeling (pink #FF6B9D), Attitude (teal #4ECDC4), Energy (orange #FFB347)
- Reduce gray elevated backgrounds throughout app
- Update tone selector to show category colors on buttons
- Update chat background pattern to use pink/teal dots
- Update message bubbles to use subtler backgrounds
- Update CLAUDE.md with new theme documentation
title: update theme for darker, more colorful design
